name: Waifu Defense
description:
When a rift from your world to reality tears open near WeebCon 2018 a horde of obnoxious otakus slip in with the intent of invading your waifu's castle. Place towers that shoot fire, ice, and cannons onto the map to destroy all them. Mess with my waifu, lose your laifu.

Made for Ludum Dare 41, this game is a mash up of a Visual Novel and Tower Defense games.  We had a late start but we intend to continue development with many more visual novel elements and waifus. Feel free to tell us any ideas you have and what you think so far.
